name: getFeedConnection
description: By passing in a FeedConnection Id options, you can search for matching feed connections

id.description: Unique identifier for retrieving single object

$ul: **accountId**: Xero identifier for a bank account in Xero. Must be included if AccountNumber is not specified.
**accountName**: The Account Name will be used for the creation of a new Xero Bank Account if a matching Xero Bank Account is not found.

**accountNumber**: String(40) when AccountType is BANK String(4) when AccountType is CREDITCARD The Account Number is used to match the feed to a Xero Bank Account. The API will create a new Xero Bank Account if a match to an existing Xero Bank Account is not found. Only the last 4 digits must be supplied for Credit Card numbers. Must be included if AccountId is not specified.
**accountToken**: This account identifier is generated by the financial institute (FI). This must be unique for your financial institute.
**accountType**: High level bank account type - BANK CREDITCARD BANK encompasses all bank account types other than credit cards.
**country**: ISO-3166 alpha-2 country code, e.g. US, AU This element is required only when the Application supports multi-region. Talk to your Partner Manager to confirm if this is the case.
**currency**: 3 letter alpha code for the ISO-4217 currency code, e.g. USD, AUD.
**error**: On error, the API consumer will receive an HTTP response with a HTTP Status Code of 4xx or 5xx and a Content-Type of application/problem+json.
**status**: The numeric HTTP Status Code, e.g. 404
**title**: Human readable high level error description.
**id**: GUID used to identify the Account.
**status**: the current status of the feed connection
